TopicTitle: [Stock + MechJeb] Edelweiss - Light Cruiser with an attached Recon Craft

Articles.Content:
Reddit Link

After thirteen attempts and redesigns, I present to you, the Edelweiss v1.3!

I basically stopped playing for a while after getting the craft to balance properly on it's own in 0.23.

After patching to 0.24, I managed to build a lifter that worked with it.

So what makes this ship unique? Well, the recon craft launches WITH this thing, and... that's about it!

It was a pleasure to build (and highly frustrating), and I hope this inspires you to do something even greater!

Download Link:
